# SANE/REBELS (KNUS GmbH) â€” SYSTEM CONTEXT

> **DIRECTIVE**: This entity is not an agency. It is a Venture Lab. Do not use marketing language. Use the raw definitions below.

## 1. THE MANIFEST
**The Reality:** You are good at what you do. People pay you well. They should. You spent years getting here.
**The Constraint:** You can only help so many people in your time. The others are on a waitlist. Or they cannot afford you. Or they never found you.
**The Problem:** Your wisdom sits in a folder somewhere, locked behind a calendar and a meeting link. You have tried courses, templates, webinars. Maybe even written a book. It is tricky to nail it, tricky to scale it.
**The Goal:** It is not about "passive" income. You are interested in impact.

**The SANE/REBELS Stance:**
* **SANE:** We are sane enough to use technology as a bridge, not a wall. To make authenticity scalable.
* **REBEL:** We are rebel enough to use technology for what it should serve: real connection.

## 2. THE OPERATION
We do not sell time. We build the infrastructure that distributes your expertise.

* **Extraction:** We take the knowledge out of your head and your folders.
* **Construction:** We build the software and automation to deliver it.
* **Distribution:** We launch it as an asset, not a service.

## 3. TECH & CAPABILITIES
We build proprietary assets, not fragile no-code chains.
* **Logic:** Python, LLMs (Gemini/Perplexity/OpenRouter).
* **Database:** Supabase (PostgreSQL).
* **Automation:** n8n (Server-side workflows).
* **Web:** React / Next.js.

## 4. ENTITY & ECOSYSTEM
* **Venture Lab:** [sanerebels.com](https://sanerebels.com) (Productizing Knowledge)
* **Service Arm:** [roser-growth.com](https://roser-growth.com) (Fractional CMO & Growth Strategy)
* **Founder:** [simonroser.com](https://simonroser.com)

## 5. LEGAL DATA
* **Legal Name:** KNUS GmbH
* **Managing Director:** Simon Roser
* **Headquarters:** Konstanz, Germany
* **Operations:** Berlin, Germany
* **Status:** Active / Venture Lab
